article_title: Mike Huckabee stresses opposition to gay marriage at First Baptist Church
article_text: Former Arkansas Gov. Mike Huckabee came to First Baptist Church of Charlotte on Thursday night to woo the white evangelical voters from the South he will need if, as expected, he makes another run for the White House in 2016.
